text: Pholidobolus dicrus, Uzzell's pholiodobolus, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Ecuador. ==References== Category:Pholidobolus Category:Reptiles of Ecuador Category:Endemic fauna of Ecuador Category:Reptiles described in 1973 Category:Taxa named by Thomas Marshall Uzzell, Jr.
title: Pholidobolus dicrus
